lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court ruled Monday that a group of homeowners in North Carolina can't sue a company that contaminated their drinking water decades ago because a state deadline has lapsed, a decision that could prevent thousands of other property owners in similar cases from recovering damages after being exposed to toxic waste.

headline.main: Court Rules Against Homeowners in Toxic Water Case
headline.print_headline: Court Rules Against Homeowners in Toxic Water Case
